nodes.text: A clone trooper was stationed as part of Resolute command on a Venator-class Star Destroyer, the Resolute, and participated in the Battle of Bothawui in 22 BBY under command of Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and padawan Ahsoka Tano. During the battle, the clone trooper informed Ahsoka that the Separatist warships were closing in on the Galactic Republic forces. Later, this clone was ordered by Ahsoka to commence fire on the enemy ships.
